column1: ahmadiyya_DESC;A form of Islam native to the Indian subcontinent
column2: Ahmadiyya Muslims believe that a powerful prophet known only as 'Ahmad' came down to India before the Event
column3: announcing that the people must repent and turn back to the True Islam
column4: or else be destroyed. To those who accepted him he showed the new way of peace
column5: that Islam would be spread hereon by peaceful means and no longer by the sword. To those who rejected him
column6: he issued condemnation. The Event then fell upon the people for their lack of faith
column7: while the chosen people remained safe
column8: hidden from the wrath. Now
column9: under the guidance of their Caliph
column10: the Ahmadiyya go forth once again
column11: to preach the religion of peace to every corner of the ruined world.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Baha'i faith is considered a Shi'ite heresy in game. This religion preaches in favor of the establishment of world peace
column3: equality
column4: and emphasises the unity of all people and religions. The faith derives from the teachings of Bahï¿½'u'llï¿½h
column5: a pre-event Persian
column6: though following the Event much information on his life has been lost.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Baptism is a strain of Protestantism that is highly charismatic and vigorous. It believes in believers baptism
column3: meaning that only adult believers should be baptised
column4: and that by full bodily immersion in water. They reject most of the Catholic sacraments and follow a Congregational model of Church governance. Baptists after the Event are isolated from their homeland in America
column5: and mostly exist as religious minorites throughout the Old World. In those regions where they are a majority
column6: they form powerful armies to defend their freedom of religion.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bharatva_DESC;Bharatva is an ideology that came to dominate many parts of India in the chaos following the Event. Basing itself on traditional Vedic beliefs and Scriptures
column2: it is a highly dogmatic religion focussed on the belief that India is a holy land belonging only to the Indians
column3: and that traditional Hindu beliefs and practices are essential to being a 'true' Indian. It calls for the unification of all 'Aryans' under the aegis of a Hindu ruler and the establishment of a Vedic society. Their antagonism toward non-Dharmic religions results in them being the most aggressive of all Indian religions.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: brethren_DESC;The Brethren faith is more a loose group of superstitions from the Atlantic and the Mediterranean. The corsairs of those seas hold together their man through the fear inspired by the risks of going against the Code of the Sea
column2: and of course against their ruler. Most rulers turn a blind eye on the acts and rituals of the Brethren
column3: especially because the Corsairs bring in a fair profit.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: calvinist_DESC;Born before the Event on the mountains of Switzerland
column2: some say from a great sage born in the depth of Alps
column3: the Calvinist faith has greatly grown after the Event. Under rulers chosen by heaven itself (for no ruler that is not chosen could ever be for long King of the Calvinists) the Calvinism faith is prepared to fight to expand the true Christian way.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: like it did through so many other crisies great and small
column3: the Catholic however did not come out unscathed. Once the faith of almost all of Europe
column4: now Catholicism survives divided
column5: surrounded by new faiths
column6: some claiming to be the true Christian faith and some swearing to destroy it
column7: the remaining Catholics have to hold together
column8: or be destroyed.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: celtic_pagan_DESC;The first cult that came from the west
column2: the Druidic faith has taken over land in the far island of Iceland
column3: and now looks to the lands of Europe
column4: so richer and greener then the homeland of this new lord. With it's new
column5: strange gods
column6: many ask themselves if this is the forebearer of more to come.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: celtic_pagan_reformed_DESC;The first cult that came from the west
column2: the Druidic faith took over the lands of Iceland. From there
column3: it has grown and strengthened. And now that so many rulers and followers pray to the Dagda and the other gods of the faith
column4: it can be truly said that the religion from the west was truly destined to change the Old World.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: chaldean_DESC;The Levant has long been home to several Christian denominations
column2: such as the Assyrian Church
column3: Chaldean Catholics
column4: and Oriental Orthodox. These churches had few or no theological differences
column5: and were mostly distinguished by which Rite they used to celebrate the Liturgy. However
column6: after the Event
column7: these differences no longer seemed as significant as the need for cohesion and survival in the face of societal collapse
column8: and so the Syriac Orthodox and Chaldean Catholic Churches joined together. This 'new' old Church is led by the Patriarch of Antioch and All the East.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_high_chairman_desc;With enough power and control of sufficient holy sites
column2: a Stalinist ruler could declare themselves High Chairman - the supreme spiritual ruler to whom religious and political obedience is owed by all.;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_zardom_desc;It has been many years since any single ruler held enough power to be considered the true Tzar of all the Russias. If we are able to unite the ancestral heartlands of Russia
column2: we may be able to finally revive that august institution in truth.;;;;;;;;x

column1: d_chaldean;Patriarchate of Antioch and All the East;;;;;;;;;x
d_maronite;Patriarchate of Antioch and the Whole Levant;;;;;;;;;x
dynamitist_DESC;Many of the ancient tales tell of the struggle between Great Nobel and his arch-enemy
column2: the Merchant of Death
column3: who seeks to bring destruction and chaos where Nobel brings life and order. However
column4: there are those that hold that Nobel and the Merchant are in fact one and the same
column5: and that he indeed is the same person under two different disguises. They believe that death is as sacred as life
column6: and therefore that killing (especially in spectacular ways) is just as much a way of worshipping Nobel as is peaceful and upright living.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: finnish_pagan_DESC;The Suomenusko faith experienced a resurgence in the lands of Finland and Karelia in the years since the Event. Fusing traditional belief of the Sami
column2: Finnish and Karelian people
column3: the Suomenusko faith is endemic of the region
column4: and focuses more on protecting Finland
column5: Karelia and the lands of the Sami
column6: rather than expand outwards. Yet
column7: so far no conqueror has ever managed to take those northern lands
column8: and all believers share the faith that it is thanks to the teachings of Ukko and Ilmatar and the bravery of their followers.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: finnish_reformed_pagan_DESC;The Suomenusko faith experienced a resurgence in the lands of Finland and Karelia in the years since the Event. Fusing traditional belief of the Sami
column2: Finnish and Karelian people
column3: the Suomenusko faith is endemic of the region
column4: and focuses more on protecting Finland
column5: Karelia and the lands of the Sami
column6: rather than expand outwards. Now united
column7: the faith is better prepared to defend the homeland and people to Vï¿½inï¿½mï¿½inen against the Devilmen
column8: the Crown worshipers
column10: and any other faith that may come to face them.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: folklorist_DESC;A belief system with roots stretching back shortly after the Event
column2: Folklorism draws from folklore
column3: ancient myth
column4: and the popular culture of Great Russia. They worship a diverse pantheon of deities
column5: which are believed to possess magnificent powers which they sometimes grant to mortal followers in exchange for worship. The most powerful deity is the mighty Mother Russia
column6: patron goddess of Great Russia and conqueror of all between the White and Black Seas.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: folklorist_reformed_DESC;A belief system with roots stretching back shortly after the Event
column2: Folklorism draws from folklore
column3: ancient myth
column4: and the popular culture of Great Russia. The religion has been reformed and restructured
column5: given a proper basis on which to base itself so that it may resist the advances of Crown and Cross.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or 'Yellow Hat' Buddhism is one of the traditional schools of Tibetan Buddhism and has absorbed many of the other schools in Tibet since the Event. It originated from Mahayana Buddhism
column3: and retains many of its traditions
column4: including an emphasis on Bodhisattvas and their intervention in the lives of believers. Traditionally
column5: the Gelugpa are led by the Dalai Lama
column6: but long ago the Panchem Lama was captured by the Chinese
column7: preventing him from recognising the reincarnation of the next Dalai Lama. As a result
column8: the traditional means of selecting the Dalai Lama was abandoned
column9: and he is now elected by a council of Lamas from around Tibet.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: jacobinist_DESC;The followers of the Jacobinist faith believe that Robespierre
column2: savior of humanity
column3: came to the world to placate the eternal hunger of Madame Guillotine. After the death of her prophet
column4: killed by the ignorance of traitors
column5: Madame Guillotine was left unfed
column6: and in the end it was humanity that paid the price in the form of the Event
column7: when she took all the lives she was denied for too long. The Jacobinist have sworn that this will never again happen. Madame Guillotine shall never again be left without food
column8: no matter the cost. It is a sacrifice of few for the sake of many.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: jugoslavist_DESC;The youngest of all Christian churches
column2: the Yugoslavist faith was born when the Car of Yugoslavia
column3: hard pressed in keeping his diverse Empire united
column4: made a desperate attempt
column5: calling a great Council of all holy men in his lands
column6: fusing all faiths in his domains in a single religion and forcing them all to accept it or lose their heads. Taking from both the believes of Orthodox and Christians
column7: and from the teachings of the Prophet of the Sunnis
column8: Yugoslavism is still weak
column9: not truly spread outside of the capitals of the nation
column10: where the Kings have more or less begrudgingly embraced the edict of the Emperor. And the only one that can strengthen it is the Car of all Yugoslavia.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or 'Red Hat' school of Buddhism was once simply another form of Tibetan Buddhism
column3: considered equally valid alongside the others. However
column4: when the Chinese captured the Panchem Lama
column5: they produced a new Panchem Lama
column6: a Han Chinese man whom they claimed to be the true Lama (called 'the Red Llama' by Tibetans). Most Tibetans rejected this 'new Lama'
column7: but some accepted him. This led to a rift in the community
column8: as it was no longer clear who the real Panchem Lama was
column9: thus the traditional means of selecting the Dalai Lama could no longer be used. Those who followed the Red Llama came to be confused with the historical 'Red Hats'
column11: and now even the knowledge that there used to be another group called by this name has been forgotten.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: though all of the Tzars are divine
column3: the greatest of them is in fact Katerin
column4: the Great Tzarina. They argue that she is obviously an incarnation of the goddess Mother Russia
column5: whom they regard as the Great Spirit who empowers all Tzars. Mainstream Zarists
column6: however
column7: regard Mother Russia as a metaphor for Russia itself
column8: and anathemise any who believe that she is a literal goddess. As a result of this
column10: though it remains popular among many women

column1: khanist_DESC;A blend of Mongol nationalism and Tengri paganism
column2: Khanism is the belief in the divinity of the great legendary hero Temujin
column3: who in times past conquered the world and gained the title of 'Genghis Khan'
column4: or 'Universal Ruler'. Khanists believe that
column5: at the height of his power
column6: Temujin was betrayed by his friend
column7: Han
column8: and cast into the jaws of The Red Menace. Now
column9: they ride ever onward over the plains
column10: hoping to find the Red Menace's cave and free Temujin from his imprisonment.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: lutheran_DESC;The Lutheran faith was born centuries before the Event. Believing the Pope to not be the real envoy of God
column2: and the cult of Saints to be little more than foolishness
column3: the Lutherans followed their founder
column4: the legendary Martin Luther
column5: and spread through Europe
column6: from Scandinavia to Germany. After the Event
column7: however
column8: their power was greatly diminished. The resurgence of pagan faith
column9: and the birth of new ones
column10: put much strain on the Lutheran church.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: school of thought was originally simply one of many schools of jurisprudence within Sunni Islam
column3: and in most parts of the world that is still the case. However
column4: in Post-Event Morocco
column5: the term has come to signify the teachings of a group that
column6: though they still call themselves Sunni Muslims of the Maliki school
column7: have developed some heterodox beliefs
column8: especially as regards who can be Caliph. In the chaos of the Post-Event world
column9: many Muslims yearn for a Caliph to unite and defend the Ummah
column10: but nobody has been strong enough and legitimate enough to do so in several hundred years. The Malikites of Morocco
column11: seeing the power of the Alaouite dynasty
column12: came to believe that an Alaouite could become Caliph
column13: even if he were not of the Quraysh tribe. This position has brought them into conflict with other Muslims
column14: creating a rift in African Islam.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: malikite_FEATURES;§Y*§! Can spend Piety to improve the stats of courtiers\n§Y*§! Does not collect the Jizya Tax;;;;;;;;;x
mansifid_DESC;A mighty warrior and staunch defender of Islam
column2: he defeated the armies of three Hindu Kings at once
column3: saving Bengal from the heathen hordes.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: maronite_DESC;The Maronite Catholic Church is an Eastern Catholic church that has been in full communion with Rome for centuries. Though they use a different Rite to celebrate the Liturgy than Latin Catholics
column2: they have no substantial theological differences
column3: and thus enjoy good relations with each other. The Maronite Church exists primarily in Lebanon
column4: and is led by the Patriarch of the Levant.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mesopotamian_DESC;Mesopotamianism is a religion derived from Islam and regarded as heretical by mainstream Muslims. They still consider themselves Muslims
column2: but also honor a group of other entities
column3: such as 'The Party' and 'The Lion'
column4: whom they believe are agents of Allah. They also hold that Arabs were once united under a single nation
column5: but that they were shattered by the machinations of al-Amriki
column6: in order to destroy the House of Peace. They believe it is their duty to unite the Islamic world to thwart the machinations of al-Amriki and his master
column7: Shaytan.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: nasrini_DESC;First spread to India by Saint Thomas the Apostle over 25 centuries ago
column2: the Nasranis have always been a minority in India. With the chaos of the Event cutting India off from most outside communication
column3: the various Nasrani Churches (both those in communion with the Pope and those in communion with the Eastern Church) united together for the sake of convenience. The example of several holy men has caused the Nasranis to grow in popularity over the last few decades
column4: to the point where they are a majority in a few parts of India
column5: though they are still a minority overall.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: naxalite_DESC;Formed from a blend of Indian tribal religion and a foreign creed imported to the subcontinent before the Event
column2: the Maunaxites have always been an insular and beleaguered group
column3: used to withstanding contempt and attacks from outsiders. The faith chiefly reveres Maushiva
column4: the Red King
column5: who inevitably rises up to destroy corrupt rulers and raise the poor and oppressed. Other deities worshipped include Vishnu
column6: Mao
column7: and
column8: of course
column9: as in every other part of India

column1: naxalite_reformed_DESC;Formed from a blend of Indian tribal religion and a foreign creed imported to the subcontinent before the Event
column2: the Maunaxites have always been an insular and beleaguered group
column3: used to withstanding contempt and attacks from outsiders. The faith chiefly reveres Maushiva
column4: the Red King
column5: who inevitably rises up to destroy corrupt rulers and raise the poor and oppressed. The faith has now been reformed
column6: adding a priestly hierarchy and formalised texts
column7: enabling it to more effectively resist the encroachment of other faiths.;;;;;;;;x

column2: Hinduism began to shift into two broad schools of thought - one highly Nationalistic and dogmatic and one pluralistic and devoted strenuously to social reform. Neo-Vedantism is a word originally used by Bharatvists to disparage the latter movement
column3: claiming that it was not 'authentically Hindu' and represented a break from Vedic tradition. Despite their best efforts
column4: the name has stuck. Neo-Vedantics are highly concerned with the social advancement of all peoples and do not believe that India needs to be reserved strictly for Hindus. They reject the caste system and discrimination against women
column5: arguing that they are incompatible with true Dharma. Though less aggressive than Bharatvaists
column6: they are not pacifistic and are willing to fight in the defense of their religion.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Nobelians worshipped an old
column3: wise
column4: bearded god who helped mankind to achieve marvels in science
column5: literature and peace
column6: sending holy men and saints on Earth to guide humanity to greatness. The numerous medals with the face of God on them proved he was largely worshipped in the old world
column7: and if Laureates are nowadays rarer than before
column8: faith can be put in Nobel to lead
column10: mankind on the path to glory.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: nousthreskeia_DESC;Originating in the distant and unknowable snowlands east of Russia
column2: Nousthreskia is a religion focussed on the belief in something called 'The Noosphere'
column3: a phenomenon by which all human consciousness is thought to be linked. Nousthreskists believe that this Noosphere is capable of altering both human consciousness and physical reality
column4: and that the Event was caused by an accident that misaligned it. They believe that mankind will never advance to a higher level of development without correcting this imbalance
column5: and seek out a mystical entity known as 'the Wish-Granter'
column6: which they believe is capable of restoring the Noosphere.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: nousthreskeia_reformed_DESC;Nousthreskia is a religion from far Siberia
column2: focussed on something referred to as 'the Noosphere'
column3: a psychic field that connects all human beings on Earth. It is believed that this field is capable of influencing both human consciousness and physical reality. The religion has been reformed and codified
column4: with a unified set of beliefs and rituals. In addition
column5: it is rumored by many that the high priests of the religion have discovered the Wish Granter at last
column6: and seek ways to unlock its power…;;;;;;;;;x

column1: novelist_DESC;Novelists were gatherers of knowledge of old. Ancient and mystics tomes holding depiction and exploits of past gods and heroes were reunited into one holy book
column2: the Novel
column3: telling the story of what really happened before the Fall. Some call it 'fiction'
column4: but Novelists firmly believe that they are precise and accurate transcriptions of the past
column5: narrating stories of heroes worthy of worship
column6: upon which one should seek the same fate.;Title;Title;;Title;;;;;;;;;x

column1: novelist_reformed_DESC;Novelists were gatherers of knowledge of old. Ancient and mystics tomes holding depiction and exploits of past gods and heroes were reunited into one holy book
column2: the Novel
column3: telling the story of what really happened before the Fall. Some call it 'fiction'
column4: but Novelists firmly believe that they are precise and accurate transcriptions of the past
column5: narrating stories of heroes worthy of worship
column6: upon which one should seek the same fate.;Title;Title;;Title;;;;;;;;;x

column1: old_believer_DESC;Originating from a pre-Event split within the Russian Orthodox Church
column2: the reasons for the Old Belivers' existence is lost in the mists of time. They maintain that the Russian Church
column3: under the influence of the demon Nikon
column4: tried to pervert and destroy Christ's Church
column5: creating the Zarist faith. However
column6: their ancestors escaped into the wild
column7: where they hid until eventually the wrath of God destroyed the apostate Russia
column8: no longer deserving the title of 'Holy'. In-game
column9: the Old Believers are extremely resilient to outside influences both military and proselytic.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: old_believer_FEATURES;§Y*§! Old Believer counties house larger Garrisons and receive combat bonuses in their own terrain.;;;;;;;;;x
orthodox_DESC;Split from the Catholic church in days lost in the mist of time
column2: the Orthodox Church grew to a great extent before the event
column3: stretching from Greece to Russia. After the Event
column4: however
column5: much like the other Christian faiths
column6: more and more land was lost to new faiths
column7: more and more people turning to forgotten gods and new deities. However
column8: thanks to the Transnistrian Empire
column9: not all hope is lost for the faith that it said to have held together many great Empires.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: orthodox_jewish_DESC;The main branch of the Jewish faith
column2: the Orthodox kept the ancient traditions alive in the changing world before the Event. And once the Event fell upon humanity
column3: more and more Jews joined the Orthodox school
column4: which became the main branch of Judaism once again. Most Jews today are part of the Orthodox faith
column5: and any other is consider an heretic.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Virgin Mary sent a vision to a great Saint of the Palmarian faith
column3: showing him that the home of Christianity was not to be Rome
column4: but El Palmar de Troya. While weak and almost gone before the Event
column5: the true faith gained new power in the years after
column6: through the claim that the lack of faith in the revelations of the Virgin Mary that caused God to make the Event fall upon humanity. With all of Spain following now the Palmarian Pope
column7: the faith can now hope to crush the misguided Catholics and their Pope in Rome
column8: and return the world under the shield of the one true church.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PATRIARCH_OF_ANTIOCH;Patriarch of Antioch and All the East;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Petrism is a strictly montheistic faith. It holds that there was and is in fact only one Tzar
column3: the immortal Peter the Great. All other Tzars are impostors
column4: seeking to steal from him his rightful worship. They are thus regarded as the worst kind of heretics by mainstream Zarists
column5: as they threaten the very core of Zarist doctrine. In-game
column6: Petrists benefit from increased martial and learning stats
column7: as Petrism teaches that one should strive to emulate Peter in his advances in the fields of science and military strategy.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: prussianist_DESC;Prussianism is a heretical branch that grew out of the Lutheran church in east Germany. The Church retains many Christian doctrines
column2: but have added extra doctrines out of step with mainstream Protestantism (and Christianity more generally). They believe that
column3: in addition to the Prophets of old
column4: God later sent a prophet to the Germans
column5: known as 'The Kaiser'. They believe that the Kaiser saved the German people from the assualt of the heretical Pope
column6: who had seceded from the true Church for political reasons. In-game
column7: the Prussianists are far more militant and aggressive than mainstream Lutherans
column8: believing in the importance of martial skill and valor.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reformed_DESC;Once a prominent school of thought in Judaism
column2: the Reformed faith has since the Event fallen out of favour in most Jewish community. Today
column3: only a handful of people still preach the idea that the Reformed faith is the one true school of Judaism.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sikh_DESC;Originating in the teachings of Guru Nanak
column2: a pre-Event preacher and holy man
column3: Sikhism is a religion distinct from both Islam and Hinduism. It rejects the caste system and believes that all people can come to true knowledge of God. Though technically monotheistic
column4: its theology is markedly different from that of the Abrahamic religions
column5: and could easily be described as Monistic or Panentheistic. In-game
column6: Sikhs receive stronger armies due to their commitment to armed defence of their religion against larger
column7: aggressive religions.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: stalinist_DESC;The Stalinist faith reveres Lord Stalin as the one and only true Tzar
column2: drawing on old texts that list him among the Protectors of Russia
column3: along with the multitude of statues and temples dedicated to his name. Mainstream Zarism came to regard Stalin-worship as heretical early on
column4: and the Stalinists were driven south by long years of persecution. Stalinists believe that only through tireless devotion and 'class struggle' can they help Lord Stalin defend the Motherland from its many
column5: many enemies.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: stalinist_FEATURES;§Y*§! Can fabricate justifications for imprisonment against vassals;;;;;;;;x
STAT_PIETY_DESC_CLASS_CONSCIOUSNESS;Class Consciousness is respected by the Comissars and especially the High Chairman. It can be spend for various favours within the Comissariates. Like Prestige
column2: it is added to your score on the death of your ruler.;;;;;;;;x
it's unfair. How can you be the ruler of all the Russias and not be the Tzar? This ridiculous farce must end - there can be no distinction between the Tzar and the temporal ruler of Russia.;;;;;;;;x
Sufism is a tradition of mystical thought common to all kinds of Islam
column3: but only in Central Africa have such schools come to dominate the religious landscape. Focussing on the inward
column4: mystical dimension of Islam
column5: the isolation of the post-Event world has caused African Sufis to develop unique characteristics that distinguish them from more mainstream Islam. Some sects have adopted beliefs from native African paganism
column6: while others are more conservative and stick closer to Sunni orthodoxy. Yet others draw inspiration from the Salafist and Wahhabi movements in West Africa
column7: attempting to 'purify' Islam from foreign influence.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sufi_FEATURES;§Y*§! Rulers can associate with one of three different schools of thought;;;;;;;;x
summer_queen_DESC;Followers of the Summer Queen believe that long ago in Avalon the Queen married a mighty and noble Knight. The Queen was given dominion over the Summer
column2: and the knight became the King of winter. Celebrations usually include morris dancing
column3: maypoles
column4: wicker men
column5: and vast amounts of cider. The Summer Queen grants health and prosperity to her followers while the Winter King protects the people from invaders and evil faery with his magical sword Excalibur.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: THE_BOOK_OF_THE_LAW;The Book of Law;The Book of Law;The Book of Law;;The Book of Law;;;;;;;;;x
THE_WILL_OF_NOBEL;The Will of Nobel;The Will of Nobel;The Will of Nobel;;The Will of Nobel;;;;;;;;;x

column2: been abandoned centuries ago by most inhabitants of the British Empire in favour of the current Thelemites faith. Old Thelema focused more on the personal will of the individual
column3: and for this was considered the ultimate cause of the Civil War in the 23rd century. Since then
column4: only pockets of Old Thelemites have survived
column5: while the new faith and the Summer Queen hold the country. However
column6: some Lodges still survive
column7: hidden deep in the countryside of Britain.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: thelemic_reformed_DESC;The Thelema faith was founded by the great prophet Aleister Crowley long before the Event. However
column2: only after it the faith truly became wildy accepted. And once the Lord Protector of Britain converted
column3: the faith truly rose to it's modern power
column4: ascending to national religion of the British Empire.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: theravada_DESC;The oldest surviving school of Buddhism
column2: Theravada Buddhism originates from Sri Lanka
column3: though from there it has spread to many parts of Southeast Asia. It is the most conservative and orthodox school
column4: basing itself on the Pali Canon. Its adherents focus on morally upright living and preserving the teachings of the Buddha as they were originally taught.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Titoism holds that Tito
column3: legendary founder of Yugoslavia
column4: was the true ruler of Russia
column5: by virtue of his title as Ruler of All Slavs. An extremely small and regional sect
column6: they are unpopular with nearly every other religious group.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: trotskyite_DESC;A small offshoot from mainstream Stalinism
column2: Trotskyists believe that Lord Stalin was in fact a traitor to Russia
column3: and that Trotsky
column4: an obscure figure hated by Stalinists but unknown to any other sect
column5: was in fact the true hero of Russia. They teach that Lord Stalin betrayed his comrades
column6: for power
column7: and that the true class struggle must be fought through prayer and inner devotion
column8: resorting to violence only when necessary.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: transatlantic_DESC;After a meeting with a representative of a certian Christian Church
column2: a fraction of Palmarians has decided that the Holy See has been relocated again
column3: and is currently located in the fabled 'New Rome' of 'The States'
column4: far beyond the Atlantic Ocean. Such revelation means that every single Christian Church of the Old World is a vile heresy! As such
column5: Transatlantics declared themselves the representatives of the Pope in New Rome
column6: and decided to take it upon themselves to spread the word of One True Pope.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: wahhabi_DESC;Wahhabism is a puritanical strain of Islam originating from the Nejd. It holds that over the centuries
column2: the Islam practiced by mainstream Sunnis had become 'corrupted' with accretions such as prayer to the saints and making pilgrimages to the tombs of holy men. They claim that only they practice true Islam and that all others are in fact practicing 'shirk'
column3: or idolatry. This attitude has led to them being highly aggressive
column4: even towards other Muslims.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Zarism is a national religion that holds that the world was created by a powerful spirit. Though He created all men
column3: most of them turned their backs on him and followed strange beliefs. Thus He abandoned them
column4: and bestowed his favor only upon Holy Russia
column5: his chosen people. Zarists hold that this Great Spirit bestows his grace upon a temporal ruler
column6: who is chosen to be Tzar. The Tzar is blessed by this Spirit
column7: commands the full and unconditional obedience of the people
column8: and upon death is taken up to Heaven and deified. Many Zarists express their piety through prayer to former Tzars and pilgrimages to their burial sites.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Jainism is believed by its followers to have always existed. The religion holds that through
column3: following the way of non-violence or 'ahimsa'
column4: humans can achieve liberation from the endless cycle of torment and reincarnation
column5: as well as omnipotence
column6: omniscience
column7: and infinite bliss. Jainism used to be a widespread religion in India but dwindled greatly in the centuries before the Event
column8: decreasing to a very small minority. That changed in the post-Event world
column9: where a new order of monks
column12: resulting in a great resurgence of Jainism throughout India.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Hellenic faith has resurfaced. This new form of Hellenism believes that the event was caused by Alexander the Great being reborn as Anaxorgos and overthrowing his father
column3: Zeus. He is the twin brother of Athena and the event is evidence of his and his siblings power. Now he wishes to reclaim his old empire and expand it to encompass the world. The conquest was only halted by the formation of Yugoslavia
column4: but for how long?;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Hellenic faith has resurfaced. This new form of Hellenism believes that the event was caused by Alexander the Great being reborn as Anaxorgos and overthrowing his father
column3: Zeus. He is the twin brother of Athena and the event is evidence of his and his siblings power. Now he wishes to reclaim his old empire and expand it to encompass the world. Only the unification of all the Balkan countries in a single nation managed to stop them. Despite the hardship they had to endure
column4: the Hellenists ultimately pulled together and fought back
